mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travel_plans (user_id, destination, start_date, end_date, total_budget, people_count, preferences, generated_itinerary) VALUES (#{userId}, #{destination}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{totalBudget}, #{peopleCount}, #{preferences}, #{generatedItinerary})
mapper.update: UPDATE travel_plans SET destination = #{destination}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, total_budget = #{totalBudget}, people_count = #{peopleCount}, preferences = #{preferences}, generated_itinerary = #{generatedItinerary} WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM travel_plans WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
